input.sentences: he was starting to call her mama even though she discouraged it .
he spent time with her children .
even her oldest adult child was fond of him .
he would comment the baby 's real mother was no good .
she told him never to say that in front of the child but in the back of her mind she knew he was right .
output.sentences: Philippine Nanny just has a new boy to watch in her home.
Philippine Nanny's older daughter is very happy to have this little brother, but the younger daughter is confused.
The husband came home found a boy and overly joyful.
He holds the boy as if he is his own son.
He would not let go with the boy and keep dreaming this is his own son.
